title: Mrs. Winstons Green Grocery and Salad Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Salad bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small natural foods and snacks store with a large salad bar featuring many vegetarian & vegan choices. Pay for salad by weight. Also has a soup bar, build-your-own sandwich bar, in addition to some food, snacks, and cold beverages for sale. Only paid parking by the shop, but you can park at the Century City Plaza mall and then walk over; it's just around the building.
